name: Bear Camp
description:
Rival bears with adorable hats vie for control of the forest by bowling explosive potions and each other at each other. A turn-based local multiplayer game for 1-4 players taking turns at a keyboard.

Created by Greg Puzniak, Adam Proctor, David Rusak, Alex Smithers and with sound and music by Ryan Roth for TOJam 12: What Twelves Below
